directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Arrange habanero pepper, jalapeno pepper, and red chile peppers on a baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven until browned, about 15 minutes.
Transfer peppers to a food processor; add tomatoes, onion, cilantro, green onions, and garlic. Pulse until desired consistency.
ingredients: 2 fresh red chile peppers, halved and seeded
title: Simple Salsa
